title: would this theoretically be a nerf or a buff to nasus?
body: his q now costs 40 mana, but half is refunded on killing a unit, and his attack range (q only) is now 175.

replies.body: It'd be a nerf but it wouldn't stop players from crying about him, Nasus is an absolute sustain beast as it is and he can shrug off damage like it's nothing, at least doubling his mana cost for his Q and getting refunds for a successful kill will help introduce some sorely needed counterplay to his early game farming. If anything it would be a buff to his late game though.

Buff. The attack range would make it far to easy to farm against other melee champions, and since his ult increases his attack range by 50 he would end up with a huge 225 attack range with his ult activated. And to that i say no thank you, i don't want to be bopped for my entire health bar when im already hiding behind my entire team.
maybe but it would help when he is being kited just out of his melee range, I would totally support this if they changed his wither a bit.
